titleStmt.title: Scripture mistaken the ground of Protestants and common plea of all new reformers against the ancient Catholicke religion of England : many texts quite mistaken by Nouelists are lay'd open and redressed in this treatis[e] by Iohn Spenser.
titleStmt.author: Spencer, John, 1601-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Antwerpe by Iames Meursius,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
